quotes.quote: Dreams can be relentless tyrants.
Destiny is simply the relentless logic of each day we live.
Write relentlessly, until you find your voice. Then, use it.
Be relentless in your looking, because you are the one you seek.
A brutal, relentless self-analysis lies at the heart of all despair.
Be kind and generous to your fellows, but hard and relentless with yourself.
Be relentlessly generous, without focusing on when it will come back to you.
You have to participate relentlessly in the manifestation of your own blessings.
Stay the course. When thwarted try again; harder; smarter. Persevere relentlessly.
The future is not as loud as war, but it is relentless. It has a terrible fury all its own.
The secret to genius is not genetics but daily practice married with relentless perseverance.
If you want to be the best in your industry you need to have a relentless dedication to your job.
Gentlemen, we will chase perfection, and we will chase it relentlessly, knowing all the while we can never attain it. But along the way, we shall catch excellence
To create something exceptional, your mindset must be relentlessly focused on the smallest detail.
Anger is the noise of the soul; the unseen irritant of the heart; the relentless invader of silence.
We gain no easier advantage than by relentlessly pursuing our goal while others pursue an advantage.
Life is choices, and they are relentless. No sooner have you made one choice than another is upon you.
A relentless focus on the outward markers of success can lead to complacency. It can make you lazy.
Some of us have a relentless urge to attempt what we can never be good at and neglect our true calling.
Keep a relentless eye on your goals! Perseverance, joyful dedication, and unwavering focus will get you there!
A man who relentlessly perspires to do excellence evidently inspires many with his intelligence and elegance.
Only a minute to minute relentless struggle can balance one's natural but stupefying insistence to remain unchanged.
Everything depends on how relentlessly one forces from experience the last drop, sweet or bitter, it can possibly give.
Leaders relentlessly upgrade their team, using every encounter as an opportunity to evaluate, coach, and build self-confidence.
Nature is relentless and unchangeable, and it is indifferent as to whether its hidden reasons and actions are understandable to man or not.
We all have a relentless yearning to attach and connect, to love and be loved. This relationship hunger is the fiercest longing of the human soul.
Tomorrow is another opportunity to relentlessly and confidently push harder with your dream. You definitely haven"t given it your all until you are living in its reality.
Be relentless in pursuing your happiness.
Be relentless and then you'll break through.
Be relentless in your pursuit for expansion.
